Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of Int'l Foundation 
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Johnny Hon, chairman of the Global Group of Britain who is chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation on Dec. 27 last year on the occasion of the New Year Juche 97 (2008).
